content.rendered:
Announcement

Registration for non-presenting delegates is now open!

Keynote Speakers Updated

Submission Deadline is Extended!

About

The 9ᵗʰ International Conference on Mechatronics Engineering (ICOM’24) is a series of conference organized by the Kulliyyah of Engineering, International Islamic University Malaysia (IIUM) and Mechatronics Engineering Department, as a part of IIUM Engineering Congress (IEC) 2024. ICOM’24 focuses on bringing together researchers, experts and practitioners to address the latest trends and technologies in the multifaceted field of Mechatronics Engineering

  • Full paper submission

  • Full paper acceptance notification

  • Camera Ready Submission [Extended]

  • Registration and payment

Award for Best Paper for each track Paper overall |

Dr. Iskandar Al-Thani Mahmood

Centre for Artificial Intelligence & Robotics

University Teknologi Malaysia

Professor, Electrical Computer Engineering

University of Memphis
